DESCRIPTION: Translation unit. Contains unique identifiers for the label, including the label’s id, maximum width, and out-of-date indicator.
Label or text in the org’s default language.
The current translation that is visible to end users selecting the target language as their personal language.
EDIT OPTIONS: Enter the translated value. Add a target tag if needed.

DESCRIPTION: Description of the metadata label, if defined, in the source language.
EDIT OPTIONS: Do not edit. Translatable field descriptions each have a separate trans-unit tag.
